scripts.start: npm run less && cross-env NODE_ENV=development RENDER_TARGET=client mix watch --hot
scripts.prod: git clean -xdf public && npm run less && cross-env NODE_ENV=production RENDER_TARGET=client mix && tar zcvf public.tar.gz public/assets
scripts.dash-start: npm run less && cross-env NODE_ENV=development RENDER_TARGET=client BUILD_FOR=dashboard mix watch --hot
scripts.dash-prod: git clean -xdf public && npm run less && cross-env NODE_ENV=production RENDER_TARGET=client BUILD_FOR=dashboard mix && tar zcvf dash-public.tar.gz public/dashboard/assets
